extendedIngredients.name: strawberries
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1-1/3 cups frozen unsweetened strawberries, thawed and halved

recipes.title: Five-Fruit Salad

winePairing.pairingText: Chardonnay, Gruener Veltliner, and Sauvignon Blanc are my top picks for Salad. Sauvignon Blanc and Gruner Veltliner both have herby notes that complement salads with enough acid to match tart vinaigrettes, while a Chardonnay can be a good pick for creamy salad dressings. You could try Mercer Estates Zephyr Ridge Vineyard Reserve Chardonnay. Reviewers quite like it with a 5 out of 5 star rating and a price of about 35 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Mercer Estates Zephyr Ridge Vineyard Reserve Chardonnay
productMatches.description: Aromas of apricot, guava and pineapple juice mingle with hints of sweet vanilla and warm toasty notes.

recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                In a large bowl, combine all the ingredients. Refrigerate until serving.                                        Yield: 6 servings.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Five-Fruit Salad in  Quick CookingSeptember/October 2005, p9                                                                                                                                                                                                         Nutritional Facts                                                                             1 serving (3/4 cup) equals 152 calories, trace fat (trace saturated fat), 0 cholesterol, 19 mg sodium, 37 g carbohydrate, 3 g fiber, 2 g protein. steps.step: In a large bowl, combine all the ingredients. Refrigerate until serving.
